description: Change of use of basement and ground floor B1 (office) use to provide Class A1 (Retail) use.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed change of use of the basement and ground floors of the existing building from Class B1 office floor space to Class A1 retail use would result in the unsubstantiated loss of Class B1 office floorspace that is considered suitable for occupation by small and medium sized enterprises and would be contrary to policies 4.1 (Developing Londonâ€™s economy) and 4.2 (Offices) of the London Plan 2011, policies CS7 (Bunhill and Clerkenwell) and CS13 (Employment Spaces) of the Core Strategy 2011, policies E4 (Loss of Business Use), E13 (Protection of Premises for Small Firms and Opportunities for Business Start-Ups) of the Unitary Development Plan (UDP) 2002, and emerging policies DM31 (Loss of Existing Business Floorspace) of the Development Management Policies Submission Version 2012 and BC8 of the Finsbury Local Plan Submission Version 2012.
